title: State Agency Decision Authority Matrix
prompt: A wide overhead shot of a rural county courthouse or administrative building's conference table scattered with documents, org charts, and handwritten notes in morning light filtering through large windows, casting long shadows across papers and coffee cups; the composition emphasizes the layered complexity of bureaucratic authority through depth of field, with some documents in sharp focus and others blurred, evoking the documentary aesthetic of investigative policy work rather than the sterile feeling of actual governance.
